stimulusHtml: Which of the following correctly indicates whether the studentâ€™s claim is correct and provides a valid justification?

features.html: An object is placed in front of a converging lens of focal length f, at a distance 2 f from the lens. The object is then slowly moved closer to the focal point. A student claims that as the object moves from the original position toward the focal point, the image decreases in size.

choicesHtml: Correct, because the ratio of the image distance to object distance decreases.
Correct, because the image is real for an object distance between 2f and f.
Incorrect, because the ratio of image distance to object distance increases.
Incorrect, because the image is virtual for an object distance less than f.
